SELECT Q001_KEY AS KEY, Q001_LRGCTGCD AS LRGCTGCD, Q001_MIDCTGCD AS MIDVTGCD, Q001_QUETXT AS QUETXT, SUBSTR(Q001_USESTRDAT, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(Q001_USESTRDAT, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(Q001_USESTRDAT, 7, 2) AS USESTRDAT, SUBSTR(Q001_USEENDDAT, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(Q001_USEENDDAT, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(Q001_USEENDDAT, 7, 2) AS USEENDDAT FROM HANGIL. TB_Q001_QUESTION WHERE Q001_LRGCTGCD = #{lrgCtgCd} AND Q001_MIDCTGCD = #{midCtgCd} AND Q001_USEYN = 'Y'
AND REPLACE(#{searchDate}, '-') >= Q001_USESTRDAT AND Q001_USEENDDAT >= REPLACE(#{searchDate}, '-')
ORDER BY Q001_SORT ASC

SELECT Q001_KEY AS KEY, (SELECT Q000_LRGCTGNM FROM HANGIL.TB_Q000_QUECODE WHERE Q000_LRGCTGCD = Q001_LRGCTGCD) AS LRGCTGNM, (SELECT Q000_MIDCTGNM FROM HANGIL.TB_Q000_QUECODE WHERE Q001_MIDCTGCD = Q001_MIDCTGCD) AS MIDCTGNM, Q001_QUETXT AS QUETXT, SUBSTR(Q001_USESTRDAT, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(Q001_USESTRDAT, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(Q001_USESTRDAT, 7, 2) AS USESTRDAT, SUBSTR(Q001_USEENDDAT, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(Q001_USEENDDAT, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(Q001_USEENDDAT, 7, 2) AS USEENDDAT FROM HANGIL.TB_Q001_QUESTION WHERE Q001_USEYN = 'Y' AND Q001_LRGCTGCD = #{lrgCtgCd} AND Q001_MIDCTGCD = #{midCtgCd} AND EXISTS (SELECT NULL FROM HANGIL.TB_Q000_QUECODE WHERE Q000_LRGCTGCD = Q001_LRGCTGCD AND Q000_LRGCTGUSEYN = 'Y') AND EXISTS (SELECT NULL FROM HANGIL.TB_Q000_QUECODE WHERE Q001_MIDCTGCD = Q001_MIDCTGCD AND Q000_MIDCTGUSEYN = 'Y')
AND Q001_USEENDDAT >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')
AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') >= Q001_USEENDDAT
ORDER BY Q001_SORT ASC

SELECT Q001_KEY AS KEY, Q001_LRGCTGCD AS LRGCTGCD, (SELECT DISTINCT Q000_LRGCTGNM FROM HANGIL.TB_Q000_QUECODE WHERE Q000_LRGCTGCD = Q001_LRGCTGCD) AS LRGCTGNM, Q001_MIDCTGCD AS MIDCTGCD, (SELECT DISTINCT Q000_MIDCTGNM FROM HANGIL.TB_Q000_QUECODE WHERE Q000_MIDCTGCD = Q001_MIDCTGCD) AS MIDCTGNM, Q001_QUETXT AS QUETXT, SUBSTR(Q001_USESTRDAT, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(Q001_USESTRDAT, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(Q001_USESTRDAT, 7, 2) AS USESTRDAT, SUBSTR(Q001_USEENDDAT, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(Q001_USEENDDAT, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(Q001_USEENDDAT, 7, 2) AS USEENDDAT FROM HANGIL.TB_Q001_QUESTION WHERE Q001_KEY = #{key}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HANGIL.TB_Q001_QUESTION(Q001_KEY, Q001_LRGCTGCD, Q001_MIDCTGCD, Q001_QUETXT, Q001_USESTRDAT, Q001_USEENDDAT, Q001_SORT, Q001_CRUSERID, Q001_CRUSERIP) VALUES ((SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(Q001_KEY), 0) + 1, 4, '0') FROM HANGIL.TB_Q001_QUESTION), #{lrgCtgCd}, #{midCtgCd}, #{queTxt}, REPLACE(#{useStrDat}, '-'), REPLACE(#{useEndDat}, '-'), (SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(Q001_SORT), 0) + 1, 2, '0') FROM HANGIL.TB_Q001_QUESTION WHERE Q001_LRGCTGCD = #{lrgCtgCd} AND Q001_MIDCTGCD = #{midCtgCd}), #{crUserId}, #{crUserIp})
